name: lockor
description: Prevent Cursor from changing certain files - a simple file locker for VS Code and Cursor

lockor.showStatusBarItem.description: Show lock status in status bar

lockor.showNotifications.description: Show notifications when attempting to modify locked files

enumDescriptions: Soft: AI discouraged, user/tools can modify freely (warnings only)
AI-Aware: AI blocked, user can edit after unlock, tools can modify (recommended)
Hard: Everyone blocked, OS read-only permissions (maximum protection)
lockor.protectionLevel.description: Choose protection level for locked files
lockor.protectionLevel.markdownDescription:

lockor.addVisibleMarkers.description: Add visible lock comments to the top of locked files (aggressive AI warning)
lockor.addVisibleMarkers.markdownDescription: **Warning:** This modifies your files by adding lock comments. Only enable if you want maximum AI visibility.
